text: Nargedia macrocarpa is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==Leaves== large, oblong to lanceolate, pointed ends. ==Trunk== Bark - smooth, polished yellow. ==Flowers== cream, rather small, 1–3 in axils. ==Fruits== broadly ovoid berry, slightly tapering at ends; seeds 2–3. ==Ecology== rain forest understory of wet zone. ==Culture== Known as "වල් කෝපි - wal kopi" in Sinhala. ==Sources== * Category:Flora of Sri Lanka Category:Nargedia Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Nargedia macrocarpa
